summary: An English teacher and struggling single mother has her life disrupted when the father who abandoned her as a child comes back into her life.
cast: Marsha Mason|Jason Robards|Donald Sutherland|Matthew Broderick|Dody Goodman|Sal Viscuso|Panchito Gómez|Charley Lau|Mari Gorman|Brian Part|Billie Bird|Tessa Richarde|Jim Staahl|Duke Stroud|Sondra Blake|David Morse|Santos Morales|Irene Olga López|Thomas Rosales Jr.|Tom Fridley|Kiefer Sutherland|Bill Aylesworth|Lydia Nicole|Elisa Dolenko|Marc Jefferson|Tom Spratley|Ray Girardin|Joey Coleman|Bradley Lieberman|De'voreaux White|Billy 'Pop' Atmore|Grace Woodard|Ken Neumeyer|Frank D'Annibale|John Corvello|Howard Himelstein|Carmen Silveroli Sr.|George P. Wilbur|Robert D'Arcy|Shelley Morrison|John Moio|Gary Combs|Benjie Bancroft|Della Thompson|Ty Fredericks|Kent Kreutziger|Patric Z|Dorian Turner|Dennis Crosswhite
title: Hola, Mr. Dugan
